mapper.select: SELECT NO, ADDRESSEE_ID, TYPE, CONTENTS, REGISTER_DATE, CHECK_STATE FROM ALARM WHERE ADDRESSEE_ID = #{addresseeID} ORDER BY REGISTER_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALARM (NO, ADDRESSEE_ID, TYPE, CONTENTS) VALUES ( ALARM_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ADDRESSEE_ID = {addresseeId}, TYPE = #{type}, CONTETNS = #{contents} )
